summary: Completed comprehensive implementation of the BeautyBooking module according to the plan. Implemented all critical features including: (1) Complete config file with all configurable settings (commission, service fee, tax, ranking weights, badge criteria, cancellation fees, consultation, cross-selling, retail, subscriptions); (2) Consultation service with pre/post consultation types, credit percentage, and API endpoints; (3) Cross-selling/Upsell system with service relations table, suggestion algorithm, and additional services support in bookings; (4) Package usage tracking with usage table, validation, and status API; (5) Badge criteria with cancellation rate calculation and automatic updates; (6) Retail sales system with products and orders tables, inventory management, and API endpoints; (7) Advertisement system with support for featured_listing, boost_ads, banner_ads, and dashboard_subscription types; (8) Ranking algorithm made configurable with weights from config; (9) Chat integration with automatic conversation creation for bookings. All migrations, models, services, controllers, and routes have been created and updated. Code follows PSR-12 standards with bilingual comments (Persian + English).
current_status: All critical and important items from the plan have been implemented. The module now has: complete configuration system, consultation services with credit logic, cross-selling functionality, package tracking, cancellation statistics, retail sales, enhanced advertisement system, configurable ranking, and chat integration. All database migrations are ready, models are updated with new relationships and methods, services handle business logic properly, and API endpoints are available for customer and vendor. The module is ready for testing and further refinement.
